about_the_game:
Nowhere is a Nordic inspired narrative mystery/horror game. Focusing on immersive and atmospheric creepy Scandinavian locations and a realistic investigation system, you play a detective trapped in the forests of Norway while searching for a group of missing tourists when you find there's more to the story than meets the eye. Tension slowly builds as you explore the world, never shaking the feeling you're being watched. Nowhere uses a unique blend of detective gameplay and survival horror in Nordic aesthetics.









A unique tale on Norse mythology, the conflicts of religion during the Viking Age and what happened to the Gods in the final years of their worship.


A blend of Detective Mystery and Survival Horror filled with suspense and slow build ups of tension, not jumpscares.


Non-Linear Open World exploring all the atmospheric and creepy locations across the forests.


Realistic Investigation Mechanics that will make you feel like a real detective. The game relies on you to make your own connections and work things out for yourself, giving you the ability to interact with the environments around you, searching for clues, inspecting sites of interest while making your investigations.


At the sound of a horn in the distance, the forests around you twist and corrupt into a nightmare version of itself. The monsters stalking you from the shadows, waiting until your back is turned. Run! Hide! Fight! Survive!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes with intense violence, blood and gore, intense fear, and strong language.
